title: IS_CONTROL_ENABLED

0x1CEA6BFDF248E5D90x9174AF84// IsControlEnabled
BOOL IS_CONTROL_ENABLED(int padIndex, int control);Parameters:padIndex: The control system instance to use. See ENABLE_ALL_CONTROL_ACTIONS.control: The control ID to check.
